Monroe MI, ONSITE, Linux System Administrator

MNX Solutions is a server management and cloud hosting provider (https://mnx.io). We are looking for an experienced Linux admin to assist with our infrastructure and consulting services.

* Ansible is a key component of our methodology. We expect experience with a configuration management solution such as Chef, Puppet, or Saltstack. * 3+ years Linux experience preferred.

Please reach out and introduce yourself via email to hr@mnxsolutions.com and reference this posting.
